title: @CommandGlobb
description: A command-line tool to execute a specified program command line on a list of input bricks.

program_command.title: Program Command Line
program_command.description: The entire command line for the program desired. The command is best put between single quotes, do not use the \ to break a long line within the quotes.

output_dir.title: Output Directory
output_dir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved.

extension.title: Output Extension Prefix
extension.description: If the program requires a -prefix option, then you can specify the extension which will get appended to the Brick names before +orig.

brick_list.title: Brick List
brick_list.description: A list of bricks (or anything) on which the program command will be executed.
